alert.note: Alert for Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:58PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Marquette County through 330 PM EDT... At 257 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Big Bay to 7 miles northwest of West Ishpeming to 6 miles northeast of Witch Lake. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... West Ishpeming around 315 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ishpeming, Negaunee and Big Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
